attention2.ptxt: After servicing, explain to the customer that it is necessary to regenerate the diesel particulate filter when diesel particulate filter warning light is lit in order to avoid unnecessary repairs.
To regenerate the diesel particulate, customer must drive the vehicle until the light goes out, at a speed of 75 km/h (47 mph) or higher for a while (max. 30 minutes).

item.ptxt: Conditions for applying fault finding procedures to stored faults:
The fault is declared present after the engine is started or following a road test.
Diesel particulate filter warning light is lit.
Specific driving requirement to regenerate the diesel particulate filter when driving.
This DTC indicates whether a specific running request has been made in order to prompt a particulate filter regeneration.
Order of priority in the event of more than one fault:
Firstly, deal with fault DTC P1431: Clogged Diesel Particulate Filter Failures:F9Q if it is present or stored.
Do not start diesel particulate filter after-sales regeneration with SUZUKI scan tool.
Regeneration must absolutely be carried out when driving insofar as possible.
The diesel particulate filter warning light is displayed on the combination meter to show a risk of the filter becoming clogged.
